sys_security_acl.description: Allow write for records in x_379823_chat_room_chat_rooms, for users with role x_379823_chat_room.chat_room_admin, and if the ACL condition (room_adminDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^EQ) evaluates to true.
sys_security_acl.name: x_379823_chat_room_chat_rooms.comments

sys_update_version.name: sys_security_acl_d8b366a187cac51028720d47dabb3592
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>false</advanced><condition/><description>Allow write for records in x_379823_chat_room_chat_rooms, for users with role x_379823_chat_room.chat_room_admin, and if the ACL condition (room_adminDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^EQ) evaluates to true.</description><name>x_379823_chat_room_chat_rooms.comments</name><operation display_value="write">write</operation><script><![CDATA[answer = gs.getUser().isMemberOf(current.u_assignment_group.getDisplayValue());
var loggedInUser = gs.getUserID();
if (current.room_admin == loggedInUser.toString()) {
    answer = true;
} else {
    var membersList = current.u_glide_list_1;
    answer = membersList.includes(loggedInUser.toString());
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-05 09:34:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>d8b366a187cac51028720d47dabb3592</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_379823_chat_room_chat_rooms.comments</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Chat Rooms" source="x_379823_chat_room">1185de2d874ac51028720d47dabb3558</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Chat Rooms">1185de2d874ac51028720d47dabb3558</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_d8b366a187cac51028720d47dabb3592</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-05 09:34:43</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
